welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Yucca Valley, a charming desert town known for its stunning landscapes and vibrant art scene. We hope you take the time to explore and soak up all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Palm Springs Metropolitan Area Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 at Palm Springs Metropolitan Area Airport serves primarily domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Twentynine Palms Airport serves domestic flights and offers basic amenities for travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bermuda Dunes Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Banning Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Banning Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
